content.value: public Task<string> ReadAnswerAsync(string question, params string[]? answers)

parameters.description: The question to print. A ? will be appended at the end.
The allowed answers, or null if all answers are allowed. If specified, this method prints the answers in the format {question} ({answer1}/{answer2}/{answer3})?.

return.description: The user's answer, or null if canceled.
